page.title: 14A DAY IN THE LIFE OF LISA
page.content: I get up at 8 o'clock and I get ready for school.At school we do Maths but I am not very good at that and I always get into trouble for not paying attention.We do lots of other interesting things at school.At lunchtime I bring sandwiches, but some people have a school meal. On Monday we go swimming with Mr.Buxton and every year we have a swimming gala.On Thursday I go for music lessons with Mr.Watson. .On Saturday I go to a Brass Band with my friends and we play with other musicians.I arrive home from school at about 3.30pm and when I come home I get changed and play my Baritone for about 15 minutes and then I have my tea and play with my friend Sarah.Usually we play on the swings and make grass houses on the green.I usually go in at about 8o'clock & go to bed at 9.30pm.
